name: colab-cat-replacer
description: Replaces all images on web pages with adorable cat pictures
author: Colab Team

colab-plugin.description: Replaces all images on web pages with random cat pictures from cataas.com

network.reason: Fetches random cat images from various cat image APIs

webview.reason: Injects preload script to replace all images with cat pictures

ui.reason: Displays cat mode status, adds context menu items, decorates TypeScript files with cat badge, shows notifications

editor.reason: Provides cat-themed console.log snippets for JavaScript/TypeScript

keybindings.reason: Registers Ctrl+Shift+M keyboard shortcut to enable cat mode
